title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. II, subch. G, pt. 195 - Deductions From Wages
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. II, subch. G, pt. 195 - Deductions From Wages

State Regulations

Subpart 195-1 - Purposes And Scope (§ 195-1.1 to 195-1.2)

Subpart 195-2 - Prohibited Practices (§ 195-2.1 to 195-2.2)

Subpart 195-3 - Deductions In Accordance With Law (§ 195-3.1)

Subpart 195-4 - Authorized Deductions For The Benefit Of The Employee (§ 195-4.1 to 195-4.5)

Subpart 195-5 - Deductions For Advances And Overpayments (§ 195-5.1 to 195-5.3)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. II, subch. G, pt. 195

Statutory authority: Labor Law, §§ 21[11], 193, 199

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
